lines.text: [To his pet hamster, Boo.]
Go for the eyes, Boo, go for the eyes!
I thank you for not stealing the pantaloons, and I will thank you kindly not to mention the stuffing in the codpiece.

[upon morale failure]
Better part of valour! BETTER PART OF VALOUR!
You are indeed family. No other could have lived to oppose me in person. Of course it will not matter in the end. Ultimately I will prevail, and a new era will be born onto the Realms.
I do not understand this "mouse-magic" that makes me do your bidding.
I have become death, destroyer of worlds.
[first lines]
No, please! There are others! I can show you!
I will be the last -
[grabs the knight by the throat and begins to strangle him]
and you will go first.
I have seen dragons with feet like rabbits! 'Tis true, I swear!
Your voice is ambrosia.

[upon Xzar's death]
And the mad wizard falls! Saves me the trouble.
Male! Fetch me something to eat!
Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice, watch it! I'm huge!
There is safety in numbers. And I'm two or three at least.
You are amusing ... in a what the hell is wrong with you kind of way.
Elminster this, Elminster that. Give *me* 2000 years and a pointy hat and I will kick his arse.
My blade will cut ya down to size!
We're all doomed.
Life is so hollow.
I am Death come for thee. Surrender, and thy passage shall be... quicker.
